description: This file defines API routes for managing menu items in a food delivery system, including creating, listing, and retrieving menu items, using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: MenuItemRead create_menu_item(payload: MenuItemCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new menu item for a restaurant.

methods.name: list[MenuItemRead] list_menu_items( restaurant_id: int | None = Query(default=None, description="Filter to a restaurant."), is_available: bool | None = Query(default=None, description="Filter by availability."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of results."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Lists menu items with optional filtering and pagination.

methods.name: MenuItemRead get_menu_item(menu_item_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches a specific menu item by ID.

ctags.name: create_menu_item
ctags.pattern: /^def create_menu_item(payload: MenuItemCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> MenuItemRead:$/

ctags.name: get_menu_item
ctags.pattern: /^def get_menu_item(menu_item_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> MenuItemRead:$/

ctags.name: list_menu_items
ctags.signature: ( restaurant_id: int | None = Query(default=None, description="Filter to a restaurant."), is_available: bool | None = Query(default=None, description="Filter by availability."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of results."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
